thread.title: Optimal accommodation in Paris
thread.title_full: Optimal accommodation in Paris - Review of Jack's Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ancusela
title: Optimal accommodation in Paris
text: I'd greatly recommend anyone who is visiting the French capital (even if just for a few days) to lodge at Jack's Hotel. The location is quiet and safe, close to tube stations and supermarkets. Very clean, modern, very pleasant personnel, very good services altogether.
